author: coder-amey
body:
Hello, @franzoni, @arunhep, @lpernie and @ggovi.

@ravindkv and I have inserted the following new attributes to the LHCInfo class [UPDATED]:
From CTPPS (4):
std::string lhcState
std::string lhcComment
std::string ctppsStatus
unsigned int lumiSection

From ECAL (4):
std::vector<float> beam1VC
std::vector<float> beam2VC
std::vector<float> beam1RF
std::vector<float> beam2RF

The modules and plugins for the LHCInfo package have also been designed and implemented.

I request you to kindly scrutinize our work and provide us with your valuable suggestions so that we can improve this pull request and get it merged.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Amey & Ravindra.
title: Added the CTPPS & ECAL attributes to CondFormats/LHCInfo
